DOC.brief_summary: The aim of our study is to evaluate the effectiveness of proton pump inhibitor (PPI) treatment in patients with functional dyspepsia.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy of Pantoprazole Treatment in Patients With Functional Dyspepsia
DOC.criteria: aged 1845 years with symptoms of dyspepsia, no evidence of organic disease. Patients with alarm symptoms, Severe concomitant illness, Pregnancy or lactation, Alcohol or drug abuse, Use of aspirin or other nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drugs antibiotics, H2 receptor blockers, bismuth, or proton pump inhibitors in the preceding two weeks
